hymn.title: Is it raining, little flower
hymn.category: Comfort in Trials—By Gain from Suffering

layout.singingstanza: Is it rain -- ing, lit -- tle flow -- er? Oh, be glad of rain! Too much sun would with -- er thee; Soon 'twill shine a -- gain. Though the sky is black, 'tis true, Yet be -- hind it shines the blue.

lyrics.stanza: Is it raining, little flower? Oh, be glad of rain! Too much sun would wither thee; Soon 'twill shine again. Though the sky is black, 'tis true, Yet behind it shines the blue.
Art thou weary, tender heart? Oh, be glad of pain; Sweetest things in sorrow grow As the flow'rs in rain. God is watching, thou'lt have sun When the clouds their work have done.
